ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Worldly Issues & "Play Nice"
ygData.msgSnippet: ... As the messages said, it easily could on our server as well but up until now player agreement had kept it one spawn, as most people felt it was better to
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, Mar 16/00, "Reeves, Patrick W" <pwr3@...> wrote:
> From: "Reeves, Patrick W" <pwr3@...>
>
> Must be nice to camp multiple spawns :) On Karana each room is seperate
> camp, has been for months.

As the messages said, it easily could on our server as well but up until
now player agreement had kept it one spawn, as most people felt it was
better to wait on the list and have a good spawn than split it down and
have a poor one.

I'm just glad that once again, I'm out of those areas before they get
that bad.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
